import sys

def main():
    t=int(sys.stdin.readline())
    for _ in range(t):
        num=int(sys.stdin.readline())
        c=0
        if num<2:
            print 1
        else:
            num=num/2
            c+=1
            while(num>1):
                num=num/2
                c+=1
            print 2**c

main()
